subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Renee Montgomery made a 3-pointer from about 25 feet with two minutes left Sunday, and made another with 6.7 seconds remaining, lifting No. 5 Connecticut to a victory.
snippet: Renee Montgomery made a 3-pointer from about 25 feet with two minutes left Sunday, and made another with 6.7 seconds remaining, lifting No. 5 Connecticut to a victory.
